## Name.normalize() method

Normalize the name by trimming and collapsing spaces.

**Signature:**

```typescript
normalize(): Name;
```
**Returns:**

[Name](./alfa-aria.name.md)

## Remarks

If the name starts or end with spaces that are removed upon trimming, also records that they are needing upon concatenation.
